"'Downstream'" is the fourth episode of the first season of the 1974 American
television series [[Land of the Lost (1974 TV series)|Land of the Lost]].
Written by Larry Niven and directed by Dennis Steinmetz, it first aired in
the United States on September 28, 1974 on NBC. The episode guest stars
Walker Edmiston.
